Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities methods which are abstracted and implemented from both the PredictLanguage and FileParser class.
    See Also:
    FileProcessor, PredictLanguage

      • addToFrequency

        protected int addToFrequency(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,LanguageEntry> langDb,
                             int kmer)
        Gets the frequency from the map passed in. Running time: O(1)
        Parameters:
        langDb - Map passed in to get frequency.
        kmer - hashcode of kmer.
        Returns:
        frequency number of kmers.
        See Also:
        JobProducer, JobProcessor

      • scaleByRank

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,LanguageEntry> scaleByRank(java.util.List<LanguageEntry> lEntry,
                                                                     int max)
        Ranks the sorted list numerically and cuts the list to the max value. Running time: O(N)
        Parameters:
        lEntry - List of Kmers.
        max - max value.
        Returns:
        temp Temporary map which is ranked and shortened.
        See Also:
        JobProducer, JobProcessor

      • encode

        protected long encode(java.lang.CharSequence s)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Tested method to use instead of hashing kmers when processing. The reason was to eliminate possible hash collisions. There is some downsides however, as longs use 8 bytes compared to 4 bytes used in a int the space complexity was increased. Also it made the overall process about %25 slower and the results weren't as accurate from multiple tests (surprisingly). So I have decided to not implement it in this build. Running time: O(N)
        Parameters:
        s - CharSequence of passed in kmer.
        Returns:
        sequence encoded kmer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs
